about_the_game:
Lysfanga: The Time Shift Warrior's music blends various music genres such as electronic and ambient (including tribal and dark ambient, and even one of its sub-genres, industrial tribal!)
Among many musicians and groups, the works of Ulf Söderberg, Steve Roach and Tzol'kin have particularly influenced Thomas and Pablo, the two composers of this soundtrack. The result is this unique piece of music, and their first album!
detailed_description:
Lysfanga: The Time Shift Warrior's music blends various music genres such as electronic and ambient (including tribal and dark ambient, and even one of its sub-genres, industrial tribal!)
Among many musicians and groups, the works of Ulf Söderberg, Steve Roach and Tzol'kin have particularly influenced Thomas and Pablo, the two composers of this soundtrack. The result is this unique piece of music, and their first album!
